hero_subtitle:
Hi, Im Alex, welcome to my blog.
I'm a full-stack developer and StartUp founder from Austria.
Here I want to share my experiences and knowledge I gained from building a startUp parallel to making a bachelor's degree in Software engineering and Management.
This journey took me a lot of perseverance, ambition, and courage but in the end, it will lead to success. That's also what the Koi Stand for.
